abstract: Anheuser-Busch, the division of Anheuser-Busch InBev that sells Bud Light and Budweiser beers, is changing its playbook in several ways for the coming Super Bowl.
snippet: Anheuser-Busch, the division of Anheuser-Busch InBev that sells Bud Light and Budweiser beers, is changing its playbook in several ways for the coming Super Bowl.
lead_paragraph: Don’t look for Bud Light commercials during Super Bowl XLIV on Feb. 7 to be centered on “drinkability,” an attribute that the beer brand has spent more than a year promoting.

headline.main: ‘Drinkability’ Lands in the Drink as Bud Light Changes Plays for Super Bowl
